title: Which of the following is the primary reason that

content.description: The following question(s) refer to the below image.
content.question: Which of the following is the primary reason that the public found Manetâ€™s Olympia objectionable?

choices.label: The nude woman was modeled on Classical statuary.
The nude woman was a recognizable member of Parisian high society.
The direct gaze of the nude woman was perceived as provocative.
The representation of nude women was strictly forbidden in the Paris Salon.

content.answer: The direct gaze of the nude woman was perceived as provocative.

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
